question:
Consider the following:
1. Humanism
2. Reason
3. Vedas and Upanishads
4. Ramayana and Mahabharata
Which of the above formed the twin pillars of Brahmo Samaj?
explanation: Brahmo Sabha was established by Raja Rammohan Roy. The twin pillars of Brahmo Samaj were Vedas & Upnishads. It was renamed as Brahmo Samaj in the year 1930. In the year 1843, Debendranath Tagore joined the organization. In the year 1857, Keshub Chandra Sen joined. The twin pillars of Brahomo Samaj were Reason and Vedas & Upnishads.
